docs.lead_paragraph: ON April 10 we will suffer a preemptive strike. The foreign troops will issue as from one of William Buckley's rarebit dreams: little men with high cheekbones speaking in opaque syllables and wielding cryptic weapons. They cannot fail to humiliate us.

headline.main: The Demonic Game Of Plock-Plack; Demonic game of plock-plack

docs.lead_paragraph: THE cluster of buildings that constitute the 1,000-bed Bronx State Hospital, one of the 29 New York State public hospitals for the mentally ill, occupies a spacious tract along the lower reaches of the Hutchinson River Parkway in the South Bronx, hard by some of the worst slums in the metropolitan area.

headline.main: The Patients Can Walk Out At Any Time at Bronx State Mental Hospital; Bronx State Hospital

docs.abstract: Article on Bronx State Hosp, NYC, for mentally ill, where every patient, whether confined on involuntary or voluntary basis, it free to leave any time he or the chooses; program at hosp is different than programs at other NYS mental hosps; Bronx State program of freedom for patients began in '66, shortly after Dr I Zwerling took over as dir, when strike of hosp's employees forced him to send 375 of 800 patients home; Zwerling found that many patients who failed to return after strike were doing better in home environment; proceeded to set up program whereby almost all patients are free to leave or use hosp facilities as they choose; variety of projects initiated as result of Bronx State program described; illus
docs.snippet: THE cluster of buildings that constitute the 1,000-bed Bronx State Hospital, one of the 29 New York State public hospitals for the mentally ill, occupies a spacious tract along the lower reaches of the Hutchinson River Parkway in the South Bronx,...

docs.lead_paragraph: Two years after the tragedy and turmoil of Kent State rocked the roots of the athletic establishment, profound changes and new causes of concern have emerged among many athletes and educators.

headline.main: Athletic Renaissance; Profound Changes in Established Roots Force Agonizing New Look at Values

docs.abstract: N Amdur comments on series of recent developments that underscore depth and diversity of new soc and pol consciousness among coll athletes in US
